DOC.brief_summary: In this trial, we test if adding an Internet-based booster program to regular Internet-based cognitive behavior therapy (ICBT) is effective for patients with obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
DOC.brief_title: Booster as an Adjunct to Internet-based Cognitive Behavior Therapy (CBT)
DOC.detailed_description: Written consent form. Completing ICBT in our previous study: Please see NCT01347099 for more details.
DOC.criteria: Signed consent Previously enrolled in our randomized controlled trial testing ICBT for OCD: NCT01347099 Suicidal ideation that could jeopardize participation
DOC.keyword: Study the specific effects of adding a booster program
